pull.title: Add release notes for listdescriptors RPC

events.body: A few minor suggestions below. Do you plan to address https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20226#discussion_r565608783?

events.message:
Add release notes for listdescriptors RPC

Original PR is #20226

events.body:

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -93,6 +93,10 @@ Tools and Utilities
 Wallet
 ------
 
+- New `listdescriptors` RPC is available to inspect contents of a descriptor-enabled wallet.
comments.body:
```suggestion
- A new `listdescriptors` RPC is available to inspect the contents of descriptor-enabled wallets.
```

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -93,6 +93,10 @@ Tools and Utilities
 Wallet
 ------
 
+- New `listdescriptors` RPC is available to inspect contents of a descriptor-enabled wallet.
+  The RPC returns public versions of all imported descriptors, including their timestamp and flags.
+  For ranged descriptor it also returns range boundaries and the next index to generate addresses from.
comments.body:
```suggestion
  For ranged descriptors, it also returns the range boundaries and the next index to generate addresses from. (#20226)
```
